entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as Tom Riddle. He is described as having gone further than anyone along the path to immortality.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is trying to understand Voldemort's actions and motivations.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Lord Voldemort. They are mentioned as not understanding what Voldemort meant by his statement about being further along the path to immortality.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects that contain pieces of a person's soul, making them harder to kill. Voldemort is described as having created multiple Horcruxes.

entities.name: philosopherâ€™s stone
entities.description: A magical object that can grant eternal life. Harry mentions it in his conversation with Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Voldemort has created multiple Horcruxes, which contain pieces of his soul and make him harder to kill.
